panels.description: Rate of transactions in this database that have been committed/rollbacked
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk
panels.title: Checkpoint Write Time

panels.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk
panels.title: Checkpoint Sync Time

panels.description: Time at which these statistics were last reset
panels.title: Last Statistics Reset

panels.description: Rate of rows in this database by action performed
panels.title: Rows

panels.description: Number of backends currently connected to this database
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: Number of connections in this state
panels.title: Activity

panels.description: Max duration in seconds any active transaction has been running
panels.title: Active Transactions Max Duration

panels.description: Number of conflicts and deadlocks detected in this database
panels.title: Conflicts/Deadlocks

panels.description: Time spent reading and writing data file blocks by backends in this database
panels.title: Read/Write Time

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Data Written to Temp files
